title: Bloomberg Markets: Kim on Italian Wine Unplugged
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kim on Italian Wine Unplugged
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Stevie Kim Director General Vinitaly International Discussing on her book "Italian Wine Unplugged: Grape by Grape" that breaks down the complex and often convoluted world of Italian wine.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
